definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: But they use game theory to reward good translations with badges, yes?
sentences.chinese: 不過譯言有運用博弈論，好的翻譯會得證章，對吧？
消防隊員和警察都佩戴證章。

sentences.english: The big Irishman with the Immigration badge looked at him.
sentences.chinese: 那個帶着移民局證章的大個子愛爾蘭人瞧着他。
